comment: Nearly five years after Eric Garner’s death, an NYPD disciplinary trial will determine whether the officer accused of using a banned chokehold on Garner will keep his job. Garner's mother, Gwen Carr, joins Full Circle. Tune in on Facebook Watch: https://t.co/Nr1ef3liHF https://t.co/r8Zi36NgBA
